data.message: I would be over the moon to win tickets for the Sunday to see Ed Sheeran (I would 100% cry😂!)  I have been trying to get tickets to see him for years now and also I never been able to get tickets to the jingle bell ball after years of trying! And now they are both in one place! 😍💞 I would take my bestfriend/boyfriend with me Chris Bumstead and we love getting ready for a night out blaring capital fm on the radio! Everything’s crossed 🙏🏼🤞🏼 #capitalfm #cocacola #capitaljbb #holidaysarecoming
